Reviews.Title: “Don't stay with these liars - Major construction work is taking place for weeks”
Reviews.Author: Julie_AnneLondon
Reviews.Content: arrived 10am flying night cuba alec brazil greeted lecture cuban politics carried own bags shabby stairs told jet lagged quiet happy moment lay bed construction started complained dear darling alec british law allowed 5pm 11am discount apology started morning left exhausted arrived construction looks weeks

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location”
Reviews.Author: peterschofield37
Reviews.Content: staying monday friday nearly 12 months im euston hotel quiet location usually value money price english breakfast im usually single obviously comfortable im surprised comments breakfast staff reviewers staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Great Reception staff, awful breakfast staff”
Reviews.Author: JacquiBournemouth
Reviews.Content: location reception staff excellent hotel staff woman serving breakfast surly rude guests walking breakfast 3 girls walked rudely told split share table avoided tables doubles table people told breakfast nearly finished caused party beans beans sausage stone cold beans vegetarian eggs swimming oil 2 slices toast 4 people twice toast time 2 slices 6 slices 4 people normally expect 2 cup pot tea 3 people breakfast experience booked trip january book elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Insects and Noise”
Reviews.Author: Sam S
Reviews.Content: friendly staff nice breakfast location euston kings cross leave luggage necessarily secure stayed single clean except squished bugs stuck walls obviously ignored cleaners arrival dated shower fine temperature easy control street noise wasnt unbearable creaking stairs floors meant waking internet wouldnt signal poor

Reviews.Title: “Great staff - not much sleep”
Reviews.Author: bellysbride
Reviews.Content: cheap hotel 10 mins walk euston 10 mins walk russell sq tube station booked single downstars trip advisor contributor hear trains 3 adequate single occupancy hot clean bed comfortable door yale lock broken self locking leaving key 24 hour reception buzz bonus fine travelling despite park opposite staff exceptionally helpful friendly breakfast served exceptional speed recommend hotel travelling couple friends single noise heat bad wasnt fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cold Sausage”
Reviews.Author: MillyandElly
Reviews.Content: stayed night location walking distance covent gardens soho oldfashioned squeaky floorboards clean value considering price receptionists extremely friendly helpful breakfast dont risk arriving 930 stone cold sausages apology blunt excuse waitress arrived 930 sorted check reception time hot breakfast rest offer paltry overall stay considering price location reception staff swap breakfast nice coffee croissant nearby cafes

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service, decent rooms”
Reviews.Author: wylib
Reviews.Content: london homes converted familyrun bb family delightful friendly helpful location gardens fantastic charming fairly quiet indian restaurant nearby late front door kept locked im neighborhood safe mistake booking left happy closeness euston station means hear running underneath ground hotels presume couldnt hear outside noise id guess hotel quieter decor carpet bathroom etc dated scrupulously clean luxury accomodations nice quiet stay easy transport nearby choice id recommend upper floors

Reviews.Title: “OK but too noisy”
Reviews.Author: KingAlfred
Reviews.Content: stayed night fine relatively cheap london hotel location bloomsbury friendly staff reasonable brilliant breakfast included price clean neat hot switch radiators leave windows couple hours sensible temparature option doing unlike chain hotels cant control heating ventilation main woken constantly night noise resident stumbling tripping bedside table sound person kept coming hours time banging fire door landing loudly sign saying please dont bang door obviously isnt doing trick id recommend invest quid mechanical means stop slamming closed wouldnt risk staying ironically noise street minimal real intrusion siren euston road

Reviews.Title: “Just Okay”
Reviews.Author: Francesw21
Reviews.Content: read reviews site getting hotel price truth okay location probably hotel basement dark dingy feeling decor dated future mismatched clean windows thin couldnt sleep becuase cold light coming gap door shower nightmare couldnt water temperature third degree burns water hot missed breakfast boyfriend awful base exploring london thats wouldnt book hotel aiming please nice weekend

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located ,Friendly staff.”

Reviews.Content: value money london hotel reading reviews breakfast staff helpful friendly valuable info visit london 2 star hotel clean warm exactly expected
